statements: SELECT * FROM pro_shop_inventory;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM pro_shop_inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, inventory_count FROM pro_shop_inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, product_name, last_stocked FROM pro_shop_inventory ORDER BY last_stocked DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM pro_shop_inventory;
SELECT * FROM pro_shop_inventory ORDER BY category DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, price FROM pro_shop_inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC, last_stocked ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT product_name, category, inventory_count FROM pro_shop_inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND inventory_count > 0
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM pro_shop_inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY price ASC, category ASC LIMIT 4
SELECT product_name, price FROM pro_shop_inventory WHERE price < 30 AND category LIKE 'Clothing%' ORDER BY product_name ASC, price DESC
SELECT * FROM pro_shop_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM pro_shop_sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM pro_shop_inventory ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC
SELECT * FROM pro_shop_sales WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity FROM pro_shop_sales
SELECT * FROM pro_shop_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM pro_shop_inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < restock_level;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity, sale_date FROM pro_shop_sales WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock AS stock_quantity FROM pro_shop_inventory WHERE restock_level <= 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM pro_shop_sales;
SELECT * FROM pro_shop_inventory;
SELECT product_name, price FROM pro_shop_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM pro_shop_inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_tracking WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold, total_price FROM sales_tracking JOIN pro_shop_inventory ON sales_tracking.product_id = pro_shop_inventory.product_id;
SELECT * FROM pro_shop_inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM pro_shop_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM pro_shop_inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 25 AND 75;
SELECT * FROM sales_tracking WHERE total_price < 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT restock_id, product_id, quantity_restocked FROM restocking WHERE quantity_restocked > 10 ORDER BY restock_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM Sales WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM Sales;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM Sales;
SELECT * FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC, price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM Sales WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Sales GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, restock_date FROM Restocking WHERE restock_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY restock_date ASC;
SELECT course_name, location FROM GolfCourses WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM golf_course
SELECT name, location FROM golf_course ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT id, name, course_length FROM golf_course WHERE number_of_holes > 18
SELECT * FROM product WHERE price < 50.00
SELECT name, category, quantity_in_stock FROM product ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC
SELECT * FROM golf_course WHERE course_length > 6000
SELECT name, location FROM golf_course WHERE number_of_holes = 18 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT id, name, category, price FROM product WHERE price < 50

SELECT p.name AS product_name, s.quantity_sold, r.quantity_restocked FROM product p INNER JOIN sales s ON p.id = s.product_id INNER JOIN restocking r ON p.id = r.product_id WHERE s.sale_date >= '2022-01-01'

SELECT pp.product_id, pp.times_ordered, p.name AS product_name, p.price FROM popular_products pp INNER JOIN product p ON pp.product_id = p.id WHERE pp.times_ordered > 10 ORDER BY pp.times_ordered DESC
